verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kina hiki kina maji mengi
pande nne zimejaa
Ee Bwana, Dunia nayo mji mkavu,
wamemezwa watu wengi
ee Bwana
(Ona) watu wauana ovyo,
(ona) vita navyo vimezidi
(tena) Magonjwa ya kushangaza
sasa Bwana tufanyeje sisi?

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Tunalia tunalia Bwana
twalilia ulimwengu huu
na machozi yetu sisi
Bwana yakiokoe kizazi hiki
usimame tutetee Bwana
tusaidie wanao. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Maji yamekuwa mengi
sana nashindwa kuvumilia
sina msaada mimi
Bwana naomba nihurumie.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Shida nyingi sana mimi
Bwana zinazidi kunisonga
nashindwa kuvumilia mimi
ee Mungu nihurumie.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Dunia nayo yahuzunisha
maovu yametawala,
watu nao wateseka sana
ee Mungu tusaidie.
